 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּפּוּחַ‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==apple-tree, apple== (from aromatic ***scent*** (breath), [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 111, 129</sup> [[BDB#Post|Post]] (see below); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup> 140</sup>; on meaning ***apple*** see [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No. 109</sup> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>JPh xiii. 65 f.</sup> [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Hast. Dict. Bib. 'Apple'</sup>) **\*\***see also Hom<sup>A. u. A. 100, 106, 107</sup>; Tristr<sup>NHB 334 f.</sup> thinks <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> = ***apricot*** (so Id.<sup>Smith DB (2) APPLE</sup>); M'Lean-Dyer<sup>EB APPLE</sup> makes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> = ***quince***. — 

**1.** singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּפּוּחַ‎</span> ***apple-tree*** [[Joel.1.12|Joel 1:12]]; [[Song.2.3|Song 2:3]]; [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]]. 

**2.** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּפּוּחִים‎</span> ***apples*** [[Song.2.5|Song 2:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵיחַ אַפֵּךְ כַּתּ‎</span> [[Song.7.9|Song 7:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּפּוּחֵי זָהָב‎</span> [[Prov.25.4|Prov 25:4]] (in simile).
